channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for CO
channel.description: The latest Form 5800.1 hazardous material reports submitted to the Department of Transportation and posted online by the Pipeline and Hazardous Materials Safety Administration, for CO

item.title: Report I-2024030009
item.description:
Report I-2024030009

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-12T15:28:43+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-20
  • City: DOLORES
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: T FORCE FREIGHT
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: DRIVER WAS MOVING SKID TO LIFTGATE, THE PALLET JACK JAMMED ON DRIVER CAUSING THE DRUMS TO BECOME UNSTABLE TO WHERE THE PALLET JACK AND DRUMS FELL OFF THE TRAILER. ONE OF THE 4 DRUMS KEEP ROLLING DOWN THE HILL INTO A POND. NO LEAKAGE FROM THE 3 DRUMS LEFT ON PARKING LOT, BUT OTHER DRUM WAS NOT REACHABLE DUE TO 8FT PLUS DROP OF LEDGE INTO POND. NO MATERIAL LOSS, DRUM INTACT WHEN TEAM RECOVERED DRUM.

  • Description: RESPONDER RESPONDED TO LOCATION OF SPILL IN PROPER PPE. RESPONDER CONTAINED SPILL - USING SPILL-TRAY. RESPONDER RETURNED TO THE DMP TO PROCESS PACKAGE.

item.title: Report X-2024021738
item.description:
Report X-2024021738

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-07T15:11:21+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pail was in unload when noticed leaking and when QA inspected can was dented and punctured on side as if was dropped. DescribePack: Bottom of pail had a small lead due to it being dented. DurationRel: 12 and MitigateEffect: Pail was placed inside a lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021740
item.description:
Report X-2024021740

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-21
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. came to QA on the IC Belt leaking inside a tote inspected and inner closures came loose and this was getting returned already for missing documents. DescribePack: Closures came loose and liquid leaked out soiling outer carton and inner bottles DurationRel: 13 and MitigateEffect: Pkg was already inside a lined tote so it was placed inside the hazmat cage.

  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jerrican shipped without overpack. Jerrican punctured and spilled. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024021815
item.description:
Report X-2024021815

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: AURORA
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: The damage was discovered in the unload. The unload manager called upon an Admin for assistance in containing the leakage. DescribePack: The leakage stems from a loose lid. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: The responding Admin contained the shipment in a hazardous materials spill tote and transported it to the hazmat cage for processing.

item.title: Report X-2024021829
item.description:
Report X-2024021829

  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: QA was called to unload and pail was on ground with the outer label wet, QA placed pail inside an lined tote and took to hazmat cage. DescribePack: The closure came loose and liquid leaked out which made outer label to soil. DurationRel: 15 and MitigateEffect: Pail was placed inside an lined tote and was taken to hazmat cage to get inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021810
item.description:
Report X-2024021810

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs in sealed plastic bags inside corrugated carton with corrugated top spacer. Loose, cross-threaded caps on two jugs allowed spillage that soiled jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.

item.title: Report X-2024021828
item.description:
Report X-2024021828

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-23
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Pkg. was in the QA area with outer carton wet and already dried. DescribePack: Upon inspection all the inner closures had loose closures and a small amount of liquid leaked out of every bottle and the outer carton got a little soiled. DurationRel: 44 and MitigateEffect: Pkg. was taken to hazmat cage and I inspected.

item.title: Report X-2024021762
item.description:
Report X-2024021762

Identified by scraper @ 2024-03-06T18:13:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2024-02-22
  • City: HENDERSON
  • State: CO
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Leaking package discovered during sortation. Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA. DescribePack: Plastic jugs with taped caps in zip-tied plastic bags inside doublewall corrugated carton with bubble wrap filler. Loose caps on three jugs allowed leakage which soiled jugs and damaged carton. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Package placed in lined hazmat tote and sent to QA.
